byline.contributor: Ashley Southall contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: California authorities say fire at Islamic Society of Coachella Valley mosque in Coachella was arson.
lead_paragraph: The blaze at a mosque about 80 miles from San Bernardino is being investigated as a possible arson, the authorities said.

headline.main: Arson Is Suspected at a California Mosque
headline.print_headline: Arson Caused Fire at California Mosque, Authorities Say

snippet: The blaze at a mosque about 80 miles from San Bernardino is being investigated as a possible arson, the authorities said.

keywords.value: Islamic Society of Coachella Valley (Coachella, Calif)
keywords.name: organizations
